channel.title: Reaper last days taking too much time
channel.description:
The last days of a reaper win/ reaper draw games takes too much time.
Suggestion: do one of the following:
1) add a button that allow players to pass a day if everyone agree. 2) make the day very short when the town doesn't have enough time to vote: for example: 4 people and 1 reaped player (no noble, king)

item.title: Reaper last days taking too much time
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
I think the point is though that if there’s more than 3 living people there “is” a way to vote someone, even if it technically involves gamethrowing of someone voting for their own ally. The problem is that if say unseen or cult has enough voting power to prevent such, but BD doesn’t know it, they may still be able to convince BD that there’s time, and lessen the odds of them doing the only possible thing (say cold steel or prince blind execute), if they have the tools but aren’t certain of who’s evil.
